Key Match Events: Georgian striker Georges Mikautadze scored a penalty to give Georgia the lead in the 45th minute.
Patrik Schick equalized for the Czech Republic with a corner kick in the 58th minute.
Post-Match Reflections: The Czech Republic will be disappointed with their performance and missed opportunities.
The Georgian defense showed signs of fatigue in the second half, allowing Czech Republic to equalize.
Miscellaneous Highlights: VAR was used to check for handball before Mikautadze's penalty was awarded.
Schick's equalizer came from a set-piece opportunity, showcasing Czech Republic's dominance in this area.
